posts.post_title: A few SGC T210 for sale/trade
posts.post_content:
I have a few duplicate Red Border cards available for sale or trade. Always looking for T209-2 and T210 all Series and condition. Prices include shipping. Thank you for your time. 

Series 4 Stockum SGC 20 SOLD
Series 5 Harrington SGC 10 SOLD
Series 7 Sherrill SGC A Apparent Trim SOLD
Larger scans available upon request. Just message me your email:D
